summary: Young passionate person able to design, develop and implement software. Knowledge in programming languages such as Python, PHP, JSP, Java, C and Swift. Management of SQL databases in interaction with Web sites. Skills for leadership, communication, to manage teams, encourage progress towards important stages of projects, control quality and meet deadlines. With desire to learn new knowledge and experiences. With more than 2 years in iOS development experience, I am prepared for any challenge.
